mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (video_title, video_src, video_date, business_id) VALUES (#{videoTitle}, #{videoSrc}, SYSDATE(), #{businessId})
mapper.select: SELECT video.video_title, video.video_src, video.video_date, video.video_id, businessinfo.business_info_legal_person FROM video, businessinfo where video.business_id = businessinfo.business_id;
